          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21771638">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>

           <br />

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21771640">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21771640">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21771640">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News of recent events
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21771640">
          <div id="boxatt21771640" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25254295">
              <a id="link_25254295" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25254295,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Labor Economics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25254295}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. An "aggregator database" containing the full text of trade journals and other business periodicals. Known for its subject indexing. Strong on information about both industries and companies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25254296">
              <a id="link_25254296" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?bKey=10482&amp;rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=soh1585&amp;rft.oclcnum=4299067&amp;issn=0099-9660&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;provider=PQUEST&amp;title=Wall+Street+Journal&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;linkScheme=pquest&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fsearch.proquest.com%2Fpublication%2F10482&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25254296,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Labor Economics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25254296}); ">
               Wall Street Journal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. The "paper of record" of the business world. Proquest version contains full text archive 1923-today. No charts or graphs
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21771641">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21771641">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21771641">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21771641">
          <div id="boxatt21771641" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25254491">
              <a id="link_25254491" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25254491,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Labor Economics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767476}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25254490">
              <a id="link_25254490" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25254490,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Labor Economics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19721252}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. An "aggregator database" containing the full text of trade journals and other business periodicals. Known for its subject indexing. Strong on information about both industries and companies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25254487">
              <a id="link_25254487" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25254487,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Labor Economics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24849416}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21772194">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21772194">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21772194">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Recent scholarly books for broad overviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21772194">
          <div id="boxatt21772194" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25254777">
              <a id="link_25254777" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25254777,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Labor Economics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25254778">
              <a id="link_25254778" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25254778,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Labor Economics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20702553}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Many authors have placed their works in Google Books as a way to increase exposure and hopefully sell more copies of their works.  Any full text that appears may not be easy to extract or manipulate, and often only snippets are available for viewing online. Use the "Find in a Library" option to "request item" on interlibrary loan (you need to be "connected to the Muhlenberg Col Libr network" to do so).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21772568">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21772568">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21772568">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Bibliography mining
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21772568">
          <div id="boxatt21772568" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25254951">
              <a id="link_25254951" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25254951,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Labor Economics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

        <td valign="bottom" height="18">
         <a href="#" onclick="return hideAlert('popupinfo')">
          <img alt="Close" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/window_close_grey.gif" border="0" align="absbottom" />
         </a>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </table>
      <div id="popupinfotitle" style="display:inline;">
       <h6>
        More Information
       </h6>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="popup_body">
      <div id="popupinfocontent" style="display:inline;">
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </div>
      <br />
      <center>
       <a href="#" onclick="hideAlert('popupinfo'); return false;">
        Close
       </a>
      </center>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="dp" style="width:850px;">
   &nbsp;
  </div>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
